data_type: access to personal information we hold about you
text: Upon request, we will provide you with access to the personal information that we hold about you.
In these cases, we may share your name, contact information and other details you provided when making an account with our partners.
Our third-party advertising service providers may also use web beacons to recognize you when you access the Services and to help determine how you found the Services.
In these cases, we may share your name, contact information and other details you provided when making an account with our partners.

If this practice should change in the future, we will update this policy accordingly and l provide an individual opt-out choice, or opt-in for sensitive data, before we share your data with third parties other than our agents, or before we use it for a purpose other than which it was originally collected or subsequently authorized.
